table.name: invoice_lineitem_remark
table.description: Can have unlimited remarks per line item per invoice. Additional free format line item information that is not associated to a specific qualifier/refnum.

columns.name: LINEITEM_SEQ_NO
columns.description: The sequence number for the line item on the invoice.

columns.name: REMARK_SEQ_NO
columns.description: The sequence number for the line item remark on the invoice.

columns.name: REMARK_TEXT
columns.description: Remarks about the line item on the invoice.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
